pages.title: Lava Fishing
pages.text: Your magical fishing rods are able to fish lava and end dwelling fish, like the special Go Fish fishing rods.$(br)Crates can also be fished, as long as you are in the open.

pages.title: Other Features
pages.text: While the Deepfry Enchantment cooks fish as usual, lures have no effect. But you are sure you will find a way to enhance your rod later.
